name: The Time Before I Was Old
name_original: The Time Before I Was Old
description:
This is a game that was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2! This is also my second fully-made game! It is a first person story-based walking simulator!

You go to the house that you used to live in. This makes you remember all the memories that you had from the time before you were old. But wait, is this what really happened? Find out by playing this game!

Made by CatAClock (Twitter: @NiceCatAClock) with some help from Killerjet101 (Twitter: @Killerjet101)!
